name: Eel Hound
description: The Eel Hound is a medium-sized fey creature that embodies characteristics of both land and aquatic life, resembling a sleek and agile hunting dog, with the ability to breathe air and water.
memorable: Its unique abilities, like Slick Spittle that creates hazardous terrain, and Water Step for teleportation, make it a challenging opponent in combat.
goals: To hunt effectively in regions where land meets water, utilizing its environment to its advantage.
relations: Often found in the company of other fey or creatures that inhabit similar environments.
strengths: Possesses Pack Tactics for advantageous combat and can teleport to maneuver in combat effectively.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and cannot communicate verbally despite understanding Sylvan.
attacks: Can perform a powerful Bite attack, dealing 11 piercing damage and grappling the target, alongside using Slick Spittle to hinder opponents.
most_powerful_ability: Slick Spittle creates a slippery area that can knock creatures prone, significantly impacting battlefield control.
skills: Has proficient Stealth skill, making it difficult to detect.
additional_information: Can breathe both air and water.
Grapples targets to restrain them during combat.
The Slick Spittle remains on the ground for one minute.
Gains advantage on attack rolls when allies are within 5 feet.
Teleports using Water Step when partially submerged.
test_queries: creature that can breathe air and water
agile fey creature with slippery abilities
medium-sized monster adept at hunting near water
sneaky amphibious creature with pack tactics
versatile creature that creates hazardous terrain
